experience: You and Beth both know Jaime Casap, Phil Manfredi, and 46 others
Thanks Phoenix Business Journal for including me in this story.

We are a full-service public relations, social media and marketing communications firm, based in Scottsdale, Ariz., with clients around the country.  We provide them with top-notch PR, online relations and marketing communications to meet their business objectives and result in increased sales.  We are Purveyors of Fine Buzz.

I work with entrepreneurs and start-ups to get them the high-level branding, marketing and PR support they need.  With over 20 years experience working with companies such as Google, KB Home and Red Bull, I have the "secrets" to great marketing and PR to share.  I spend extra time getting things ramped up so they are well on their way to being an established brand and making sales.
PR and Marketing Strategist and Consultant

I provided marketing, PR and social media training and coaching to Speedpro franchise owners and their marketing assistants nationwide. I conducted monthly webinars on topics ranging from using Google AdWords and Social Media for Business to Email Marketing Best Practices and PR 101.

I oversaw all editorial aspects of Trends Magazine, including determining yearly editorial calendars and monthly content, making assignments, writing, editing and proofing.  Trends is the oldest society magazine in Arizona and features everything related to luxury living:  high society, charitable events, dining, travel, automotive reviews and fashion.
I worked in the PR department on clients such as Qualcomm, Sun Microsystems and Baxter's Bentley Division
Kappa Kappa Gamma, Delta Sigma Pi, PRSSA, Ad Club, American Marketing Association, Amnesty International
Kappa Kappa Gamma, Delta Sigma Pi, PRSSA, Ad Club, American Marketing Association, Amnesty International
After serving on the Heart Ball committee for several years, I was elected to serve as chairman for the 50th Anniversary Heart Ball, which raised over $1.8 million.
After serving on the Heart Ball committee for several years, I was elected to serve as chairman for the 50th Anniversary Heart Ball, which raised over $1.8 million.
I chaired the annual American Cancer Society Gala in Phoenix in 2011 (50th Anniversary) and 2012.  We raised over $500,000 to support ACS programs in Phoenix, as well as national research.
I chaired the annual American Cancer Society Gala in Phoenix in 2011 (50th Anniversary) and 2012.  We raised over $500,000 to support ACS programs in Phoenix, as well as national research.

With my mom Betty McRae and sister Stephanie McRae, I founded and created the annual "Compassion for Fashion" fundraiser for the Arizona Humane Society.  Since its inception, it has raised millions of dollars to help Arizona's animals.

recommendations: Nancy Keane
Public Affairs, PR, Government Relations and Communications - Albertsons, Safeway, Vons     Southwest Region
March 14, 2011, Nancy was a client of Beth’s

For more than eight years I’ve had the honor of working with Beth McRae.  From her serving as the 50th anniversary Heart Ball Chair, to her active engagement as a member of the  American Heart Association’s board of directors,  Beth is always willing and able to share her public relations expertise to help the AHA.  In addition to her generous donation of time and talents, Beth has an unbelievable willingness to make time for media opportunities at any given hour, and serve as a spokesperson.As an American Heart Association volunteer Beth is dependable, professional and above all passionate about her commitment to increase the quality of life for all people through the elimination of cardiovascular disease.  Her passion is contagious, as is her calm and confident demeanor.  It has been nothing short of a huge privilege to work with Beth on many different projects and levels.Because of Beth McRae, the American Heart Association’s visibility has escalated throughout Arizona and country.  Her strong sense of commitment is second to none, as is her integrity.  It has been nothing short of amazing working alongside Beth!  To me she epitomizes that of an outstanding professional woman!Nancy Keane, Arizona Director of Marketing & CommunicationsAmerican Heart Association/American Stroke Association

summary: WHAT I DO: I help clients achieve their sales goals through PR, marketing and social media.I have over 20 years of experience in the public relations and marketing fields, having worked with companies ranging from WD-40 Company, Discount Tire and Tiffany & Co., to Google, Red Bull, KB Home and Sunny Delight, as well as many up-and-coming brands and start-ups.  Clients count on me to give them savvy, creative solutions that help them increase their exposure and sales.Specialties: Publicity, social media, online relations, strategic planning, creative problem-solving, media relations, events, strategic partnerships, trade show relations, community relations, promotions.
name: Beth McRae
title: PR, Social Media and Marketing Expert
